Package model

Class WordleAccount

java.lang.Object
model.WordleAccount
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class WordleAccount extends Object implements Serializable
This class is a WordleAccount that contains a username and password. Also keeps track of the accounts win streak, total games, number of games won, max streak and guesses per game. These stats are useful for the StatisticsPage.
